description:
Unlike your regular workout leggings, the Abisko Trekking Tights HD are built for the rigours of the trail. Combining the easy stretch and fit of leggings with the durability of hiking pants, these tights let you leap over logs and scramble up rocks.

  • 4-way stretch fabric wicks moisture and lets you move freely
  • Durable reinforced patches at the knees and seat stand up to sharp rocks and bushwhacking, plus they provide protection when sitting on wet ground
  • High waistband for coverage with internal drawstring for adjustability
  • Gusseted crotch, flatlock seams and pre-shaped knees enhance fit and reduce chafing
  • Pockets on the thighs and side hold your phone, map, compass and lip balm
name: Fjallraven Abisko Trekking Tights HD - Women's
